renderpass.code:
//           strip                    wave
#define S(x,y,s)   abs(fract(x)-.5) < .4  ? .7 + .3* sin(1.57* ( y +s - ceil(x) )) : 0.

#define mainImage( O, u )                       \
    vec2 U = u / 50.;                           \
    O += max ( S( U.x,U.y,0.) , S(U.y,U.x,1.) )
renderpass.name: Image
